properties.Name: AdvertisingCampaign
properties.Description: A planned and coordinated execution of one or more Advertising Event(s) to achieve an overall set of objectives addressing product or message awareness.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCampaignId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Advertising Campaign.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCampaignName
Columns.Description: The name of the Advertising Campaign.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCampaignStartDate
Columns.Description: The date that the advertising campaign is planned to start.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCampaignEndDate
Columns.Description: The date that the advertising campaign is planned to end.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCampaignCreativeStrategyStatement
Columns.Description:
An outline of what message should be conveyed, to whom, and with what tone. This provides the guiding principles for copywriters and art directors who are assigned to develop the advertisement.

 Within the context of that assignment, any ad that is then created should conform to that strategy. The written statement of creative strategy is sometimes called a "copy platform."

Columns.Name: MediaObjectivesStatement
Columns.Description:
A statement of the media goals or objectives of the advertising campaign.

For example, a specific level of a particular demographic group, season, timing, geography or budget.

Columns.Name: AgencyCommissionPercentage
Columns.Description:
The agency's fee for designing and placing advertisements. 

Historically, this was calculated as 15 percent of the amount spent to purchase space or time in the various media used for the advertising. In recent years the commission has, in many cases, become negotiable, and may even be based on some measure of the campaign's success.

Columns.Name: PlannedTotalAdvertisingCampaignExpensesAmount
Columns.Description: The planned total advertising campaign expenses to be spent.

Columns.Name: ActualTotalAdvertisingCampaignExpensesAmount
Columns.Description: The actual total advertising campaign expenses spent at the end of the advertising campaign.

Columns.Name: AdvertisingCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Advertising Category.

Columns.Name: AgencyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Agency.

Columns.Name: MarketingCampaignId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Campaign.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: BrandId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand.
